title: Ticket #3455: condor_submit -interactive does not always override args correctly
description: when condor_submit -interative is used with a submit file, it is supposed to override Executable, Arguments, Universe, and Queue to be compatible with interactivity. The current code doesn't always override Arguments correctly.

Support also added for -dump to stdout via -dump -. ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
